title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 307.1 - Withdrawals for f.o.a.s.i
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 307.1 - Withdrawals for f.o.a.s.i

State Regulations

Those members of the New York State Employees' Retirement

System who previously paid for their retroactive Federal old-age and survivors
insurance coverage out of their accumulated contributions are permitted, at any
time prior to their retirement, to redeposit in one lump sum into their
accumulated contributions the amount withdrawn therefrom for such
purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
307.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
